title: Bandette 1-5 + Specials (Monkeybrain|2012->|Dgtl-1920|Empire)
description:
Rather reminds me of Hitchcock's "To Catch a Thief", though I can't quite put my finger on the parallels, other than the obvious subject-matter ones. Just, y'know, with an actrette instead of Cary Grant in the lead... Audrey Hepburn, preferrably. :)

---
